table

HTML Structure
<div class="data-table">
	<table>
		<caption>caption name</caption>
		<colgroup>
			<col style="width: 5em;">
			<col>
		</colgroup>
		<thead>
			<tr>
				<th scope="col">Header cells</th>
				<th scope="col">Header cells</th>
			</tr>
		</thead>
		<tbody>
			<tr>
				<th scope="row">Header cells</th>
				<td>Data cells</td>
			</tr>
		</tbody>
	</table>
</div>
